<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Maiden's Mending](/Feats.aspx?ID=2330) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Changeling" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=212" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 22 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Frequency**
once per minute

**Trigger**
You cast a non-cantrip occult spell or an innate spell from a changeling ancestry feat.

</column>

---

You can tap into some of the magic that flows through your blood to give you new life. You gain a number of temporary Hit Points equal to half your level (minimum 1) that last until the end of your next turn.
name: Maiden's Mending
